CustomField.description: Transfer Parts with Type = Fee or Incentive Payment set the checkbox to TRUE and are used to reduce Credits Available for Allocation on the Production
CustomField.formula: IF( OR (ISPICKVAL(Type__c, "Fee"), ISPICKVAL(Type__c, "Incentive Payment")), TRUE, FALSE)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Transfer Parts with Type = Fee or Incentive Payment set the checkbox to TRUE and are used to reduce Credits Available for Allocation on the Production
CustomField.label: Reduce Available for Allocation
